Description.Text: Residenza Romanico Palace is a refined 3-star hotel offering classic accommodation in the heart of Rome. It boasts a spa, fitness centre, rooftop garden and an excellent location close to Via Veneto. The area surrounding the prestigious, tree-lined Via Veneto is famous for its exclusive apartments, grand hotels, luxury boutiques and popular cafes. Nearby places of interest include the elegant Spanish Steps, Trevi Fountain and the beautiful Villa Borghese gardens. Barberini Fontana di Trevi metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Rome destinations. The hotel occupies a traditional mid-rise building featuring an elegant facade with shuttered windows and decorative stonework. It is an annex of the Romanico Palace Hotel, which is located next door. Facilities include a gym and spa comprising a sauna, steam room, relaxation room. A range of massage and body treatments are available on request. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are individually and elegantly decorated with various colour tones and Venetian-style furniture. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, mini-bar safe and an en-suite marble bathroom. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and can be enjoyed in the roof garden accompanied by panoramic views of Rome. Guests can enjoy a relaxing drink at the Poeticus American Bar, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
